description:
Collapsed data format - row attributes and counts of rows. Format is:
 attr11,attr12,attr13...rows_cnt1
attr21,attr22,attr23...rows_cnt2
...
 Where attr is some value.

name.description: Name can be used in the column definition section called data-convolution.

file.description: File is the path to data on disk.

separator.description: Separator is the symbol used as a separator while parsing separated values from the file.
